code: import{prueba}from"./VentasFormat";export function searchDataVenta(){if(!localStorage["venta"]){localStorage["venta"]=JSON.stringify(prueba);}let ventas=localStorage["venta"];ventas=JSON.parse(ventas);return ventas;}export function removeDataVenta(remove){let ventas=searchDataVenta();ventas=ventas.filter(item=>item.idVenta!==remove);localStorage["venta"]=JSON.stringify(ventas);}export function editDataVenta(edit){let ventas=searchDataVenta();ventas=ventas.filter(item=>item.idVenta!==edit.idVenta);ventas.push(edit);localStorage["venta"]=JSON.stringify(ventas);}export function saveDataVenta(venta){let ventaList=searchDataVenta();ventaList.push(venta);localStorage["venta"]=JSON.stringify(ventaList);return true;}export function reloadDataVenta(){localStorage.removeItem("venta");return searchDataVenta();}
